Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City will try to keep its three-game home win streak intact when the Thunder take on Houston.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City finished 57-25 overall, 36-16 in Western Conference play and 33-8 at home during the 2023-24 season.
Others: The Thunder allowed opponents to score 112.7 points per game and shoot 45.5% from the field last season.
Houston finished 41-41 overall and 28-24 in Western Conference play during the 2023-24 season.
The Rockets averaged 16.4 points off of turnovers, 14.6 second-chance points and 33.1 bench points last season.
Thunder: Kenrich Williams: out (knee), Isaiah Hartenstein: out (hand), Jaylin Williams: out (hamstring), Nikola Topic: out for season (acl).
Rockets: Tari Eason: day to day (illness), Steven Adams: out (knee), Dillon Brooks: day to day (illness).
